COMMENT_TX: ej,richp101,M,soarh901,Obstruction call $Minnie Minoso's throw to 2B was wide and Nellie Fox fell on Harry Simpson; when Fox took his time getting up, he was called for obstruction; White Sox Manager Paul Richards ejected by 2B umpire Hank Soar (no error charged to Fox)
$Chico Carrasquel collided with Bud Stewart, out with jammed right shoulder
$Mike Garcia spiked Jerry Coleman on right elbow and thumb; Coleman received two stitches in elbow
$Al Rosen suffered broken nose from bad hop
$Dom DiMaggio argued called second strike and refused to get in batter's box; HP umpire Charlie Berry ordered Early Wynn to pitch and called third strike
ej,millb110,C,honoj901,Call at 1B Athletics Coach Bing Miller ejected by 1B umpire Jim Honochick sometime in game
ej,kolld101,P,hurle901,Bench jockeying $Tiger kolloway, not in game, ejected by HP umpire Hurley for bench jockeying

ej,hutcf101,P,hurle901,Balls and strikes (charged umpire) $Pitcher Hutchinson ejected by HP umpire Hurley as he walked off field at end of inning for arguing balls and strikes; after ejection, he charged umpire
$Gene Woodling slid hard into Bobby Avila and the two almost came to blows
ej,tebbb101,P,stevj901,Balls and strikes Birdie Tebbetts ejected by HP umpire Johnny Stevens

ej,taylz101,M,summb901,Fan interference non-call $the ball barely cleared the wall; Cliff Mapes argued he had caught it and a fan took ball from his glove; Browns Manager Zack Taylor ejected by 1B umpire Bill Summers
ej,richp101,M,duffj901,Ground-rule double call White Sox Manager Paul Richards ejected by 2B umpire Jim Duffy claiming the ball cleared the wall on the fly for a home run
$After force at 2nd, throw to 1st was late, but Carrasquel had rounded third too far and Easter threw to 3rd to retire him. This is a GDP
